title: Jack and the beanstalk
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Fairy tales - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Faerie tale theatre". Shelley Duvall introduces her Faerie Tale Theatre project starring famous artists in famous fairytales. In this well known tale Jack sells his cow for 5 magic beans, which when planted grow to reach a kingdom in the sky. The only problem is it's ruled by an angry giant. Jack manages to steal gold coins and a hen that lays golden eggs, bringing wealth to his poor mother and himself. He discovers a secret that provides him with a motive other than money to go back up the beanstalk, only this time the giant comes after him. Starring Dennis Christopher, Elliot Gould, Jean Stapleton and Katherine Helmond.
related_objects: Series; S00998; Faerie tale theatre; Active; 1984
